summary:
After analyzing the website https://internships-climate.ipsl.fr/recherche/job/simuler-des-vagues-de-chaleur-extremes-en-europe-avec-le-systeme-aifs-lsce-59/, hereâ€™s what information can be scraped:
Job title
Publication date
Application deadline
Views count
Organization name
Contact email
Recruitment level
Internship status
Duration
Location
Supervisor name
Supervisor email
Supervisor function
Research team
Internship funding
Thesis possibility
Subject themes
Keywords
Associated IPSL research themes
Job description
Work proposal details
Internship timeline
Required qualifications
Academic references

content_zones.description: Main navigation menu with links to different sections of the internship portal
Panel containing key dates, views, and basic internship information
Section with supervisor contact details and organizational information
Comprehensive section listing recruitment level, duration, location, and other administrative details
Main content area with detailed job description, work proposal, and requirements
Academic references and bibliography related to the internship topic
Institutional information and social media links

structural_characteristics: Structured internship details in labeled sections
Standard institutional footer with legal information
scraping_challenges: Some information is embedded in text paragraphs rather than discrete elements
Date formats may vary across different fields
Contact information mixed with descriptive text
Reference section uses complex citation formatting
Some fields may require parsing of concatenated information
CSS selectors may need adjustment based on theme variations
